text.p: Headlines from major national newspapers. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Prime Minister Jose Maria Aznar avoids discussing future of party's leader in Catalonia Aleix Vidal-Quadras
- ETA offensive in Galicia with explosive devices in Santiago and Bayona
- Football down a tube (television coverage deal)
- Heavy buying of Pryca shares in the stock market
- Revaluation of assets with conservative criteria
- Carrefour invests 30 billion to control 69 percent of Pryca (had 63.8 percent)
